item.title: Week 2 9/1-9/7
item.dc:creator: Joseph
item.description: Due to the hurricane, not that much work was able to be accomplished since we were busy preparing for the hurricane and couldn’t do much work other than some researching. Fernando worked on some animations for our first character. Joseph researched and played with WordPress themes. Alex went through some tutorials for Unity.
item.content:encoded:
Due to the hurricane, not that much work was able to be accomplished since we were busy preparing for the hurricane and couldn’t do much work other than some researching.

Fernando worked on some animations for our first character.

Joseph researched and played with WordPress themes.

Alex went through some tutorials for Unity.

item.title: Week 1 8/25 – 8/31
item.dc:creator: Joseph
item.description: First week of school Formed team, brainstorming ideas. Leaning towards a game similar to Worms/Shellshock Live Joseph started on the website Fernando set up the Unity project Alex started to get familiar with Unity
item.content:encoded:
• First week of school
  • Formed team, brainstorming ideas.
  • Leaning towards a game similar to Worms/Shellshock Live
  • Joseph started on the website
  • Fernando set up the Unity project
  • Alex started to get familiar with Unity
